channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAP, FortiAP-S, FortiAP-W2, FortiAP-U
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAP, FortiAP-S, FortiAP-W2, FortiAP-U

item.title: CVE-2022-29058|2024-08-03T06:10:59.290Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiap%2C%20fortiap-s%2C%20fortiap-w2%2C%20fortiap-u
item.description: An improper neutralization of special elements [CWE-89] used in an OS command vulnerability [CWE-78] in the command line interpreter of FortiAP 6.0.0 through 6.4.7, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3, 7.2.0, FortiAP-S 6.0.0 through 6.4.7, FortiAP-W2 6.0.0 through 6.4.7, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3, 7.2.0 and FortiAP-U 5.4.0 through 6.2.3 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized commands via specifically crafted arguments to existing commands.
